exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: destruct (Pdec n) as [Hn | Hn]. - exists n. split. + split. * apply Hn. * intros x Hx. left. apply Nat.le_gt_cases in Hx. destruct Hx. { left. apply Nat.lt_le_incl; apply H. } { right. apply H. } + intros x Hx. apply Hn. - pose proof (Punb n) as [k [H1 H2]]. pose proof (sinc_decidable P S) as [H3 _]. apply H3 in Hn as [H4 _]. pose proof (min_dec P H3 H4) as [m [H5 H6]]. exists m. repeat split. + apply H6. + apply H5. + intros x Hx. apply H6.
